description: The adversary intentionally interrogates an AI system about its embedded knowledge. Since some AI systems fully share these resources when explaining certain answers, full knowledge sources or artifacts can sometimes be listed and even leaked if targeted directly by an adversary.
name: Embedded Knowledge Exposure

object_references.description: An adversary can discover information that's been embedded in the AI system under the misconception that it would only be used for training and wouldn't be directly accessible to the AI system's users.
